languages.text: "Даже в эпицентре антрацитово-багровой бури ты, Кибелла, излучаешь ровное серебристое сияние. Физическая боль для тебя — мимолетный всполох. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Даже в эпицентре антрацитово-багровой бури ты, Кибелла, излучаешь ровное серебристое сияние. Физическая боль для тебя — мимолетный всполох. Почему?"

languages.text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
languages.original_text: "Даже в эпицентре антрацитово-багровой бури ты, Кибелла, излучаешь ровное серебристое сияние. Физическая боль для тебя — мимолетный всполох. Почему?"

traits.locale_text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
"Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
"Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
"Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
"Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
"Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"

languages.text: «Incluso en el epicentro de una tormenta de antracita y carmesí, Kibellah, emite un resplandor constante y plateado. Para usted, el dolor físico no es más que una sensación efímera. ¿Por qué?».
languages.original_text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"

languages.text: 「たとえ深紅の嵐の真っただ中にあっても、キベラさん、あなたは銀色の輝きを放っているのね。あなたにとって、肉体的な痛みはただの感覚的な揺らぎでしかない。それはなぜ？」
languages.original_text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"

languages.text: “即便身处血红色的风暴中心，你，绮贝菈，也始终散发着沉静的银色光芒。对你而言，肉体上的疼痛仅仅是一闪而过的感觉，这是为什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"

languages.text: "Selbst im Zentrum eines anthrazitroten Sturms geht von Euch, Kibellah, ein silbriger Glanz aus. Für Euch ist physischer Schmerz zur eine kurze Empfindung. Warum?"
languages.original_text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"

languages.text: « Alors même que vous vous tenez à l'épicentre d'une tempête anthracite et écarlate, Kibellah, vous rayonnez d'une douce lueur argentée. Pour vous, la souffrance physique n'est rien de plus qu'une simple sensation. Pourquoi ? »
languages.original_text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
"Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"

languages.text: "Kibellah, antrasitvari kızıl fırtınanın merkezinde bile gümüşi bir parıltıyla ışık saçmayı sürdürüyorsun. Senin için fiziksel acı, duyuların ürpertisinden ibaret. Neden böyle?"
languages.original_text: "Even at the epicentre of an anthracite-crimson storm, you, Kibellah, radiate an even, silvery glow. For you, physical pain is a mere flicker of sensation. Why is that?"
